ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] money problem
ygData.msgSnippet: Go around and turn yourself into different objects in front of people and try to make funny comments. Sometimes amusing people will get you money. but do it
ygData.messageBody:
Go around and turn yourself into different objects in front of people and
try to make funny comments. Sometimes amusing people will get you money. but
do it for fun, not just for money.
luv,
-Su

> You know what's sad, my 24 enchanter ran into a level 6 chanter last
> night...he was decked out FAR better than I was. I need some PP!
>
> Lena
> << >
> > I am still new to EQ I am looking for ways to earn money. I read post
> > were people half my lvl (Bard lvl 6) have all this $. I am open to
> > suggestions.
> > >>
>
